desc: I came with my friend and we had made a reservation before hand. We arrived about 10 minutes early and decided to get some coffee. I got a 12oz latte and was very surprised at the cute cat latte art the barista had made! My friend got an americano, so no latte art for him. About 5 minutes before our reservation, one of the staff came out and gave us a rundown on some rules to make sure we can enjoy our time with the cats to the fullest. The cats were adorable and really liked my friend, he had 3 of them playing with him at one point. We would totally come by again!

imgs.alt: Cup of latte with cat latte foam art.
Cup of latte with latte foam art of a cat's head in shape of a heart.
Cat themed earrings for sale hanging off a jewelry display.

desc: Super cute cats. I thought I was going to get bored midway but time passed by faster than I thought it would.
